name: SlimeCreate
description:
SlimeCreate is a concept of 2d platformer where the player has to reach the Exit portal since the entry portal while avoiding many enemies and obstacles on his way. He can put objects at the beginning on the map at the beginning of the party to win. He has to make the best score for every level.

The game is actually just a concept. If you liked him, you can tell me why you liked him and if you have ideas or suggestions, leave a comment. 

I'm always looking for people motivated to work in many ideas of game whicj i have so if you are good in 3d modelling, level design, graphic design or game design, add me on GameJolt or Twitter.

Controls by default

ActionKeyClickMouse0InteractELeftQRightDJumpZDouble-JumpZ-Z
